statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, travel_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT insurance_options FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT customer_id, travel_history, insurance_options FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';

SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, travel_history FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_options FROM customer_preferences WHERE travel_history @> '{"recent_trip": "Paris"}';
SELECT customer_id, insurance_options FROM customer_preferences WHERE travel_history ->> 'total_trips' > '10';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE pref_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM travel_history WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT customer_id, travel_date FROM travel_history WHERE travel_purpose = 'Vacation' ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trips FROM travel_history;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'Theme'
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY preference_name ASC
SELECT * FROM travel_history WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01' AND travel_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY travel_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, destination, travel_purpose FROM travel_history WHERE customer_id = 5 AND destination LIKE '%Beach%'
SELECT * FROM preferences JOIN travel_history ON preferences.customer_id = travel_history.customer_id
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_type DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type FROM preferences WHERE preference_type = 'category';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium FROM insurance_options ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM travel_history WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount FROM insurance_options WHERE premium > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_type LIKE '%email%' AND preference_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, trip_id, destination FROM travel_history WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY return_date ASC, departure_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM insurance_options ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT offering_details FROM tailored_offerings WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

SELECT customer_id, preference1, preference2 FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT destination, travel_date FROM travel_history ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT option_name, coverage_details FROM insurance_options WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%medical%' ORDER BY option_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, offering_details FROM tailored_offerings WHERE LENGTH(offering_details) > 50;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM preferences;
SELECT * FROM travel_history ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT destination, end_date FROM travel_history WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, coverage, premium FROM insurance_options WHERE premium > 1000 ORDER BY coverage DESC;
SELECT * FROM tailored_offerings WHERE theme_suggestion = 'Beach Vacation' AND insurance_suggestion = 'Travel Medical' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_history WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, coverage, premium FROM insurance_options WHERE premium > 1000;
SELECT offering_id, theme_suggestion, insurance_suggestion FROM tailored_offerings WHERE theme_suggestion = 'Adventure' AND insurance_suggestion = 'Full Coverage';
